name: Confined Indorms
description:
Follow us on Twitter, @ConfinedIndorms

Quaranteam Production is composed of seven veteran Gameheads students who are passionate about video game development and design to help our community by telling their stories.

The team is made up of our artist/animator, Tyatie Suarez, our lead programmer, Matthew Zhang, our project manager and programmer, Harry Zhu, our narrative designer, Chun Tat Chan, our sound designer, Israel Valenzuela, our game designer, Daniel Medrano, and our level designer, Alberto Ramirez.

-

Special Thanks to the staff, affiliated mentors, and board members of Gameheads LLC!
